The user holds their arm out with their palms flat at target, launching a powerful stream of water to push them back.

== Trivia ==
* This technique's Japanese name is homophonous with {{translation|"crystal"|水晶|suishō}}, which first kanji is the same kanji for water {{translation|"water"|水}}.
